ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Cantana of Soothing
ygData.msgSnippet: Yea, when I first saw their enhancements for hybrids I noticed bards were left out and started thinking, Here we go again. But then I hit the sections that
ygData.messageBody:
Yea, when I first saw their enhancements for "hybrids" I noticed bards were
left out and started thinking, "Here we go again." But then I hit the
sections that specifically talked about bards. I'm just glad they didn't
forget us or relegate us to the dreaded "we'll fix it later" status.

---Windleaf

At 04:44 PM 12/5/00 -0500, Gordon Hughes wrote:
>[spoiler information mega-snipped]
>
>I'm beginning to like Velious already! What with this and the new armour
>and the recent changes to our mezz songs (which won't work on the new
>giants...) things are definitely picking up for us.
>
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
